data.title: Iridium 9555 WiFi-To-Go Package
data.meta_description: The Iridium 9555 WIFI Package includes the Iridium 9555 Satellite Phone (with all standard accessories), RedPort Optimizer, SatStation Solarboost 3, Pelican Case 1400, SatStation Single-Bay Battery Charger and an extra Iridium 9555 Li
data.text:
About the Iridium 9555 Satellite Phone

The Iridium 9555 is the ultimate in dependable mobile communications. It is a ruggedly built tool, not a toy. It won’t play games, take pictures, or play MP3s. What it will do is work. The 9555 incorporates innovations such as integrated speakerphone, improved SMS and email capabilities, and an upgrade Mini-USB data port. The Iridium 9555 features a dramatically redesigned and amazingly intuitive user interface-making reliable communication more reliable than ever.The highly anticipated Iridium 9555 Handset is 30% smaller and 27% lighter than the 9505a. With a significantly reduced footprint from the previous Iridium hand held models, it is more hand-friendly in form, and its aerodynamic features such as an internally stowed antenna, this sleek handset is designed to go wherever you do. Without exception. It is engineered to withstand the world’s toughest environments, so the world’s toughest customers can depend on it as a critical lifeline whenever and wherever need takes them.

About the RedPort Optimizer

Use the GMN RedPort wXa-102 Satellite Router with an approved satellite data service and you can save up to 80% on airtime bills while experiencing web browsing 3-5 times faster and email up to 20 times faster. A powerful built-in firewall blocks all unwanted traffic, preventing runaway airtime bills. With 12V compatibility the wXa-102 is designed to be hard-wired into your vessel or you can use an optional adapter to truly make installation a snap. WiFi Hotspot adds convenience and eliminates the compatibility problems of USB cables. Includes international power adapter simplifies installation for wall-plug use. Works with Windows, Mac, and Apple IOS including iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch.

About the SatStation Solarboost X

The SatStation Solarboost X has a 20000mAh High Capacity Li-polymer battery, it can charge your phones 8-10 times or tablets 3-4 times for an average of 9 days of usage per charge. The Solarboost X comes with 4 fold-able high-efficiency solar panels that charge up to 4-6 times faster than other solar chargers, with up to 1A input current under the sunlight. The included micro USB cable can be used to charge the device conventionally. The Dual 2.1A USB ports allow you to charge 2 devices simultaneously with 2.1A high speed charging while auto detecting your devices' for the optimal output. The Solarboost X rugged construction is dust, shock and waterproof, with a built in LED flashlight with SOS mode making it perfect for outdoor emergencies.

About the Pelican Case 1400

This 1400 Case is unbreakable, watertight, airtight, dustproof, chemical resistant and corrosion proof. It is made of Ultra High Impact structural copolymer that makes it extremely strong and durable. Its exclusive 1/4" (6.4 mm) neoprene o-ring and ABS latches seal perfectly and includes an automatic purge valve for quick equalization after changes in atmospheric pressure. Your equipment can fit into the high density foam of the case for total subjection and protection against impact, vibration or shock.

About the Iridium 9555 Lithium Ion Battery

The Iridium 9555 Lithium Ion Battery is rechargeable and offers up to 30 hours of standby time and 4 hours of talk time. The Iridium 9555 Lithium Ion Battery (Iridium Part Number BAT20801) works with the new Iridium 9555 satellite phone.

Understanding Iridium's Satellite Network
